subdisciplines.name: Cell Signaling
subdisciplines.description: The study of how cells communicate with each other and their surroundings.

subdisciplines.name: Cellular Physiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how cells function, including metabolism, energy transport, and cell division.

subdisciplines.name: Cellular Imaging
subdisciplines.description: The use of imaging techniques such as microscopy to visualize cellular structures and processes.

subdisciplines.name: Stem Cell Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of stem cells, including their development, differentiation, and potential applications in regenerative medicine.

subdisciplines.name: Cancer Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the cellular and molecular processes involved in the development and progression of cancer.
